name: Food Factor Conference
content: The Food Factor Conference will be held in Torremolinos-Malaga (Spain) from 8 to 9 November 2018\. This two day conference will offer an excellent opportunity for researchers from a broad range of academic disciplines to present, exchange and disseminate information and experiences on food science. If you are interested in presenting your most relevant recent research results at the conference, we now welcome proposals for oral, poster or virtual presentations. Submit your abstract at http://www.foodfactor.org/participate-abstracts/ Important deadlines: • 18 July: early registration • 10 September: abstract submission (for oral presentations) • 17 September: abstract submission (for poster and virtual presentations) • 15 October: late registration
